text: Edward M. Zwick (born October 8, 1952) is an Emmy Award-winning American movie and television director, writer and producer. He was born in Chicago. His best known movies are About Last Night, Glory, Legends of the Fall, and The Last Samurai. He is also the co-creator of the television series thirtysomething and Once and Again. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: Edward Zwick
